# How to use visible

## create your app

```ts
import { useVisible } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const visible = useVisible()
        return <span>{visible ? '👀' : '❌'}</span>
}
```

import { useVisible } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const visible = useVisible()
        return <span>{visible ? '👀' : '❌'}</span>
}

<App />
